name: XWUI Collapse Component
description: Animated expand/collapse container component. Smoothly animates content height changes with customizable duration and easing. Supports destroy-on-collapse mode for performance optimization.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

expanded.description: Whether the collapse is initially expanded

easing.description: CSS easing function for the animation

destroyOnCollapse.description: Whether to remove content from DOM when collapsed (for performance)

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the collapse container

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

content.description: Content element or HTML string to display in the collapse container
